Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.streams

Class BufferedIStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.streams.BufferedIStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStream
    public class BufferedIStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStream
    This class allows you to use an input stream while recording the last N values from the stream It extends from IStream, so it also workes with the existing IStream classes
